Social And Cultural Activities: Upliftment of downtrodden and development of cooperative institutions as well as education institutions in rural areas.
Literary Artistic & Scientific Accomplis: Founder member for establishing the Karnataka Ranga Bhoomi Abhivrudhi and Uttejan Sahakari Sangha, Belgaum;and Director, Karnataka Ranga Bhoomi, Abhirudhi and Uttejan Sahakari Sangha, Belgaum;
Other Information: Awarded (i) Bharatiya Udyog Ratna, 1996; (ii) National Industries Excellence Award; and (iii) Shresta Sahakari award as young co-operative leader; Honoured at Mysore
